plot outline: "Sat Sri Akal" propagates a way of life impregnated with rich heritage of true Punjabi culture, traditions, moral values, emotions, Sikh tenets, and above all, love and faith. The movie is a humble tribute commemorating 300 years of Gurta Gaddi Diwas (Coronation) of Sri Guru Granth Sahib. Based on true happenings, the narrative of the movie revolves around love, traditional values, sentiments and colossal faith in Almighty God.
title: Sat Sri Akal
plot: "_Sat Sri Akal_ (qv)" propagates a way of life impregnated with rich heritage of true Punjabi culture, traditions, moral values, emotions, Sikh tenets, and above all, love and faith. The movie is a humble tribute commemorating 300 years of Gurta Gaddi Diwas (Coronation) of Sri Guru Granth Sahib. Based on true happenings, the narrative of the movie revolves around love, traditional values, sentiments and colossal faith in Almighty God.
